recommended_degree: Mesin Industri, Teknik Mesin, Teknik Industri, Statistika (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Stratifikasi data Overall Equipment Effectiveness (OEE) & Loss Reject
2. Membuat MSUCA Scoreboard produksi 
3. Membuat Production Control Board (TPM Board, SGA Board, Henkaten Board)
4. Shopfloor management (Genba Kanri)
5. Penempatan Surabaya
